titleStmt.title: Mirrha the mother of Adonis: or, Lustes prodegies. By William Barksted. Horrace. Nansicetur enim pretium, nomenque poetæ. Whereunto are added certaine Eglogs. By L.M.
titleStmt.author: Barksted, William, fl. 1611.
Machin, Lewis, fl. 1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Iohn Bache, and are to be sold at his shop in the Popes-head Palace, nere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "Three Eglogs" by Lewis Machin has separate title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
